review:
Für alle, die das Spiel, nach dem Titelbildschirm, nicht starten können: Ihr braucht einen normalen Controller. Der Vr Controller funktioniert nicht und die Tasten auf der Maus oder der Tastatur funktionieren ebenfalls nicht. 
Zum Spiel selbst: Für 2€ ist es mal schön gesehen zu haben. Grafik ist verschwommen, also erwartet nichts hochqualitatives.

author: {'steamid': '76561198825431360', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1673958933}
review:
indexとdualshock4でプレイ　indexコンは動かなかった
ちゃんと動くしゲームとして成立しているのでポーカー好きなら遊び半分で買って損はないかも
少し画質は悪くピントも合いづらいが、vr映像コンテンツに慣れている人ならそういうものだと思えるだろう
女の子はパンツとブラだけになったところで去っていくのでそれ以上を求めるとがっかりする
画面を最前面に持ってこないとコントローラー効かないので注意

review: No se puede jugar con Oculus Quest, Quest 2 ni Rift, y dudo que con ningún otro se pueda, no especifican el visor pero los que he probado no deja pinchar en ningún lado, te deja apuntar con la vista pero no pinchar. Tampoco te deja pinchar con el teclado o ratón y con mando tampoco (no se si con el de valve original dejará pero no me lo pienso comprar para probar solo este juego. Yo no recomendaría nunca un juego que no funciona bien, por lo tanto no lo recomiendo en absoluto.

author: {'steamid': '76561197961017729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3428, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1707418520}
review: At 2.49 this is a steal. Sure it's a FMV kinda game, but it's decent quality video, stereoscopic 3d if I recall correctly. It's boring and takes along time to beat each level, but it is very tasteful, and again, for the content and production values 2.49 is fine. I recognize the rest of you are into the anime cartoon pornography, but they charge up the nose for that stuff, and you have to set your computer to Japanese to even be able to install it. [spoiler]Frankly, you should pay 2.49 for this, because those models didn't work for free. Neither did the director. And those craft services tables don't come cheap either. Mmmmm. craft services........[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561197971692751', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 241, 'playtime_forever': 29, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1588366577}
review:
How to play in vr
You need a vr headset ( i used pimax 5k+ and  Vive index controller and base stations.
To play the game without a "steam controller" you have to use the RIGHT thumpstick on your right valve index controller.

When the game have started do this.
Up = fold cards
Down = select wich cards to exchange for new ones.
left = next   ( example after you selected card press next to advance )

But all in all, the idea of the game is nice the only girl i played against ( katie ) did a good job.
The atmosphere and room is also good with nice music.
When you win the girl will take off one piece of clothing each time and once you win you see her undressed for a few seconds before she walk off camera and you then go back to the main page where you can play on a harder level and later on unlock other girls.

However the game is a bit boring and not really that interesting.

I think the developer should make a non vr version of this game where people can use keyboard and mouse to control it instead of vr.. it will result in more sales all though i think game have been abandoned since 2017.. no updates as far as i know.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051240392', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1550620994}
review:
He de decir que no entiendo las críticas variadas a este juego. El juego es simplemente lo que viene en su propia ficha: juegas al poker con tres chicas diferentes y cada vez que pierden se quitan algo de ropa. Ya está. 

¿Podría ofrecer algo más? Sí, claro, a mí personalmente me gustaría que hubiera más chicas y que el vídeo final de la partida (cuando pierden) fuera más largo, pero es que el juego es baratísimo, tampoco se le puede pedir mucho más a ese precio.

Lo mismo más de uno se esperaba un juego de poker con la profundidad de Skyrim, vete tú a saber.

author: {'steamid': '76561198285605207', 'num_games_owned': 2608, 'num_reviews': 534, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1549795556}
review:
一号技师颜值高，二号技师身材曲线棒，三号技师胸臀大。
只剩内衣时，技师就挥手拜拜了。
赢，并不难。难的是怎么凑同花顺和皇家同花顺解锁成就。

没有“色情内容”，最多算“裸露”，标签是欺诈。
而且没有配音，技师们光张嘴，却不说话。
这种游戏不可能有神秘补丁的，所以，自己考虑清楚再买。

author: {'steamid': '76561198066590240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2800, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1511464907}
review:
I'm not sure what the mixed reviews on this game or app or about.  This game delivers on exactly what it promises.  Is it the best 3d video quality out there?  Nope.  Is the fact that motion controllers aren't used problematic in a VR game of this type?  Yup.  

However, this game does exactly what it says.  The amount of variation on the animations is pretty surprising.  Most of the time the video is pretty smooth.  Even if it's not the best quality.  It's good enough.  Plus you're actually playing the PG-13 version of strip poker (well, I never lost so I never tried to take my clothes off IRL).

I honestly thought I would refund this game, but wanted to check it out while it was on sale.  I wasn't really expecting much and this game was actually better than my expectations.  The actresses did a good job of selling this, without going overboard and even on easy, you do have to play your cards right.

Rate 6/10 get it on sale

author: {'steamid': '76561198060339493', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1502871957}
review: 强烈要求再找几个牌友，现在这三个牌友都知根知底了。打起牌来没有新意，她一起身我就知道她脱哪一件衣服！

author: {'steamid': '76561197978851675', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 326, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 161, 'last_played': 1583526929}
review:
To the question on everyone's lips, the answer is no.  At least on easy difficulty (Edit: and medium difficulty), the game goes no further than you'll see at the beach (albeit in lingerie rather than bikini) and the developers comments I've seen elsewhere suggest there is no more at greater difficulty levels.

The game is stable and has no glaring issues but the interface needs work.  I'd like to see a means of easily determining the amount your opponent has raised by without doing a little mental arithmatic and an announcement by the opponent, or a status update when your opponent raises would be useful.  Moving the cards further into the players field of view would also be useful as you need to crane you neck just a little to see the cards and to select which to discard.  Speaking of which, so far as I can tell, the game does not announce how many cards your opponent has discarded, this is important information in poker so it should be clearly announced in some manner.

When it's the players turn to act first, the game lets you raise or fold and your opponent will do the same.  I'd prefer to be able to check as well and let the opponent set the pace.

The girls are very pretty and the price is easy on the pocket.  All in all, I had fun so this just barely rates a reccomendation.

author: {'steamid': '76561198122180903', 'num_games_owned': 229, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 225, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 225, 'last_played': 1496481026}
review:
真的是贱。。。光这个“色情内容”的标签，我就已经打开支付宝准备支付了。。

游戏里面有三个模特（技师），你可以挑选一位跟你切♂磋牌技，扑克的玩法跟德州有点相似，每人起手五张牌，下注之后换掉你不想要的牌，换牌后再进行一次下注，然后比大小。每人手上400筹码，输光的脱一次衣服（不好意思我还没输过）。然后模特就会。。。你放心，不会一次性脱光，你得赢她四次她才会把最原始的美展现给你。

三个模特中间的最漂亮，左边的最性感，右边的最闷骚，哈哈哈哈哈哈

每个模特还有三种难度，但是你放心，她们的衣着动作不会有任何变化，只是打牌难度单纯的增加了而已，简直没有意义

另外这个游戏有可能是我最期待更新的VR游戏了，技师真的好漂亮。。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198018678851', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 21, 'last_played': 1496931727}
review:
In bold type it says "requires a VR headset" before you download..  But only after downloading and running the game did it tell me I couldnt play because it REQUIRES a gamepad controller.  Cant use your mouse, or keyboard for input, and doesnt use the VR controllers.     The game MIGHT be worth the 9$ I paid for it, I wouldnt know, couldn't play it.  I DOUBT it is worth the 60$ it would cost for this game, AND a gamepad controller.   So, if you do not have a gamepad, do not bother.
      Should have been more up front about this requirement, and frankly, no need to not support at least mouse, or keyboard input.  Cannot recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198162676196', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1496231892}
review:
Dont waster your money!!
This game simply does not work with the htc vive controller. Something as simple as chooseing a card to exchange is frustratingly impossible. Also, there is no way to re-centre the view so your head hangs strangly well above your body. 

Overall it is a cheap looking game..

author: {'steamid': '76561198258022771', 'num_games_owned': 1061, 'num_reviews': 335, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1496158235}
review: It's well-made although far from perfect. First of all there's the limitation of current 360 videocams, so don't expect sharp video. The main thing that bothers me is that when the girls walks out of the video, when the game is finished, you basically see her disappear in the middle of the scene/video. Talking about an immersion-killer :).  Still, it's the first time that I see an interactive/playable 360 video and it wasn't that bad. The models are certainly pretty but don't expect great acting.  Their replies when you win are also somewhat predictable and corny ("I'm speechless!"). I can't really comment on the poker aspect because I normally don't play poker games, but I think it's safe to say that they made it (very) easy for the player, probably too easy.  Ater your first win, you unlock a higher difficulty setting, but I fail to see why you would play this again, considering the fact you already saw the girl (more or less) undressed after winning in Easy mode. (I don't think the video-loops will be different in a higher difficulty). I read something about a social aspect (receiving text messages from the opponents after you beat them), but so far I haven't received anything, which is good because I don't want trouble with my wife.  The price is a bit high for the content, I think 5 or 6 EUR would have been better. All in all, it beats the the Strip Poker I played on my Atari ST back in 1988. Recommended for casual VR players and curious boys that have 9 EUR to spare ..    :)
